Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 1 Hetugocchaka » 1.2 Sahetukaduka » 1.2.1 Paṭiccavāra » 1.2.1.1 Paccayānuloma » 1.2.1.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Nissayādi
Hetugocchaka
Sahetukaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Nissayādi
60.
162Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko dhammo uppajjati nissayapaccayā…  upanissayapaccayā…  purejātapaccayā…  āsevanapaccayā…  kammapaccayā…  vipākapaccayā…  āhārapaccayā…  indriyapaccayā…  jhānapaccayā…  maggapaccayā…  (jhānampi maggampi sahajātapaccayasadisā, bāhirā mahābhūtā natthi) sampayuttapaccayā…  vippayuttapaccayā…  atthipaccayā…  natthipaccayā…  vigatapaccayā…  avigatapaccayā.
<< Aññamaññaup1.2.1.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra >>
